articles.title: Trump to host top tech CEOs - except Musk - at White House dinner Thursday
articles.summary: The guest list is set to include Microsoft cofounder Bill Gates, Apple CEO Tim Cook, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, and a dozen other executives from the biggest artificial intelligence and tech firms, according to the White House.
articles.translated_title: Trump to host top tech CEOs - except Musk - at White House dinner Thursday
articles.translated_summary: The guest list is set to include Microsoft cofounder Bill Gates, Apple CEO Tim Cook, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, and a dozen other executives from the biggest artificial intelligence and tech firms, according to the White House.

articles.title: Trump to Host Meta’s Zuckerberg, Tech CEOs in Redone Rose Garden
articles.summary: Tech industry leaders including Meta Platforms Inc.’s Mark Zuckerberg, Apple Inc.’s Tim Cook, and Microsoft Corp.’s Satya Nadella are expected to attend an artificial intelligence event hosted by First Lady Melania Trump on Thursday and then join President Donald Trump for an evening reception in the newly renovated Rose Garden.
articles.translated_title: Trump to Host Meta’s Zuckerberg, Tech CEOs in Redone Rose Garden
articles.translated_summary: Tech industry leaders including Meta Platforms Inc.’s Mark Zuckerberg, Apple Inc.’s Tim Cook, and Microsoft Corp.’s Satya Nadella are expected to attend an artificial intelligence event hosted by First Lady Melania Trump on Thursday and then join President Donald Trump for an evening reception in the newly renovated Rose Garden.

articles.title: Oakland Ballers to use artificial intelligence to manage Saturday home game against Great Falls
articles.summary: OAKLAND, Calif. (AP) — Oakland Ballers manager Aaron Miles will leave it to artificial intelligence to decide when to pinch hit or replace his pitcher.
articles.translated_title: Oakland Ballers to use artificial intelligence to manage Saturday home game against Great Falls
articles.translated_summary: OAKLAND, Calif. (AP) — Oakland Ballers manager Aaron Miles will leave it to artificial intelligence to decide when to pinch hit or replace his pitcher.

articles.title: Oakland Ballers to use artificial intelligence to manage Saturday home game against Great Falls
articles.summary: The playoff-bound Oakland Ballers of the independent Pioneer League are turning to artificial intelligence to manage all aspects of Saturday’s home game against the Great Falls Voyagers at Raimondi Park.
articles.translated_title: Oakland Ballers to use artificial intelligence to manage Saturday home game against Great Falls
